title: On Infrared Universality in Massive Theories. Another Example
abstract: The infrared behaviour of the ${\phi}^3$-theory is discussed stressing analogies with the Witten-Seiberg story about $N=2$ $QCD$. Though the microscopic theory is apparently not integrable, the effective theory is shown to be integrable at classical level, and a general solution of it in terms of hypergeometric functions is obtained. An effective theory for the multiparticle soft scattering is sketched.
